storyInfo: Yato and company enter the forest with the two Felynes in tow, watching their surroundings with curiosity. Tracking the Rathalos had not been fruitful and the Felyne Artisan stole some foul-smelling fowlbeast’s eggs, so they ran into...

attributes.content: Captain's audio log number two.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Current time, 0915 hours. Weather, cloudy. We have returned to the Soubo mountain range, and are currently continuing our advance.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Since the last recording, I along with Operator Noir Corne have encountered a series of unexpected situations while executing our mission.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: We first engaged in combat with an unknown lifeform... a Rathalos. We were not successful in this endeavor.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Upon arriving at the village, our usual investigation into the source of the Oripathy outbreak was met with significant resistance from the locals.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Their reasons are still unclear, though from the medical tests conducted, it seems that the villagers have been in contact with Originium for an extended period of time.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: In summing up the clues we've gathered so far, we have determined a course of action: we will continue to track the Rathalos into the forest to try and pinpoint the source of Originium contamination. Progress so far has been poor...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Ugh—The thicket here is too dense. Corne, hand me an axe.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: What did you just hand me? I said to give me an axe, not—what is this...uneven... and squirming...ah!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: An Originium slug?!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Originium slug?
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: Why was there one on my hand?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: The slug has no bones... and a very hard carapace, very good! I like it very meowch!
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: Corne—where did you go?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Hey mew, take a look. The seeds of this plant burst out with just a touch.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: They flew so far away, pawbably to extend the range of theirs dispersal... reminds me of a Blastnut.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: This might be related to the Rathalos's whereabouts...Oh! Could it be...
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: I'm pawsitive that is completely unrelated to our search.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: (Breathes deeply)
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: ...We are currently travelling with some additional companions from another continent that bear some resemblance to Felines.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: That's Felynes to mew!
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: They call themselves Felynes with a Y, and possess information on the Rathalos.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: With the help of these Felynes and the extensive problem-solving expertise of Rhodes Island Operations Team A4, I believe we will soon unravel this incident.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Yato! This way!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: No, over here! The Rathalos went this way!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: But you said it was this way earlier...
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Those were old tracks, it left new ones here!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Hmph! Anyway, just head this way! Mew are as stupid as a Kestodon!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar
Noir Corne
attributes.content: What did you say? What's a Kestodon—

attributes.name: Noir Corne
attributes.content: Augh! Who chopped down the tree here?
A slow monster that purretty much always charges around and gets stuck in trees!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: ...We're close to getting to the bottom of this. Recording complete.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Corne. Felynes.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Listen up, we've been walking for two hours, and have yet to see even a glimpse of the Rathalos.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: If you'd like to continue your argument, I'll send you both back to that cave to have a nice chat with all the Originium slugs.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Smithy, keep your meows down.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Mrow?
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: Look over there, on the flowers.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: In the underbrush?
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: Undoubtedly, there must be—yes! A whole bunch of tiny, squirming, endemic lifeforms hidden beneath!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Just a little closer—
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: Hidden within the shadows, danger creeps closer, with the flying insects none the wiser...
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: The concealed predator holds for just a meowment, fur its chance is close at paw! The time is... now!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: One expels a puff of smoke, and the insects are wobbling, are they about to fall?
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Mrrow... head hurts...
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: A—Achoo—
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: Smithy! Look at what you did! Scared them all away!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Suddenly so sleepy... so many meowterials dancing in the clouds...
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: Even the flying insects dropped from that puff of smoke... could it be one of its properties?
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: I shall note this down... a new kind of endemic lifeform that can cause drowsiness in those affected. Purrphaps it may even be helpful in hunts.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Tiny endemic life and flying insects, flying insects and nectar, Meownsters and Hunters... the resemblance is too much to bear.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Mrrow... just like...
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: Yes, Smithy. I've been noticing this ever since we came here, but while I'm pawsitive that Terra is a totally different world, it shares so many similarities with ours.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Whether it be the villagers or creatures I've observed, a closer look has revealed that we share meowch more commonalities than diffurences.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Our Ecological Survey in the forest so far has led me to the conclusion that while the endemic life here appears diffurent from the ones we are used to back home, the way things work is exactly the same.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Plants, herbivores, carnivores... predator and prey constitute the basis of most biological relationships.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: The degree of similarity between these two worlds... is simply remeowkable.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: As I've said befur, our prior knowledge is adequate to understand this world, fur there is no fundamental diffurence.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: I can also record the Rathalos's activities here up close, and become Terra's top ecological researcher.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: I'm the purrime scholar after all! Meowhahaha!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: To be an ecological researcher here, Originium will definitely be a factor to consider.
Originium, mew say? I did hear Noir Corne mention it multipaw times, but I have not whiskered any obvious influence...
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: I don't think it's that meowch of a problem. If you simply take a look at people like Noir Corne, they're pawbably just too dumb to understand how it truly works, purrphaps the rocks have their own special qualities even!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: However, this forest does indeed raise some concerns in me. It feels like something's missing, but I can't be sure what.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: What could it pawssibly be...
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Smithy, what do mew think—
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Ah, Noir Corne? Why are you here?
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Me? Should I not be?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Smithy? Mrow? Where did mew go?
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: If I recall correctly, is that it?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I'll go take a look.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Careful, don't step on it.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Hey, you're right. Straight from the pages of 'The Originium Slug's Guide to Terran Wildlife'... Vanilla reminded us of this countless times before we left.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: 'Top three creatures to worry about in the forests!' 'An aerial nightmare you definitely want to avoid!'
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Sporting dazzling silver and black feathers and an appearance from the front as dark as a ghost in the night...
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: If you see patches of black and silver feathers on the ground, it means there's a stinkfowl nest nearby.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: And the moment you step into their territory, only one thing awaits you...
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Yato! Noir Corne! I can't find Smithy anywhere!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: What? Where did you lose sight of him?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: We were just meowing about, and he—
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Corne... did you hear that?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Yeah, sounds like wings flapping in the sky to me.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: They're getting more intense...
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Over there.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: S-Should I go take a look?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Meow!
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: Arty! Where have you been?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Noir Corne! Fur mew!
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: What? This is...
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Wait, don't just skedaddle! Where are you going?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Corne... isn't that...?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: You don't mean—
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Stinkfowl eggs.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Hey! Arty! Get back here this instant!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Ah—Don't come any closer, it wasn't me who took your eggs! I'll even put them back for you, okay?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: I'll return them right now! Don't peck me! Not my horn!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Agh! It stinks! Blegh—
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Yato! Help me out!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Arty! No more egg pinching for mew!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: From Operator Noir Corne's personal experience:
If you are in the forest and see molted feathers from Stinkfowls marking their territory, never trample upon their nest.
And never, ever touch their eggs.
Otherwise, what greets you is only...
A foul and fierce assault from the sky to be reckoned with.
Did we get away? They're not chasing us, right?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: They got stopped over there.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I'm beat...
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Do you want some water?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Wait, don't come any closer to me.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Put your shield up so it can block the smell a little... I'll toss the bottle over.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Yato...
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Corne, I hope you understand that it's best for us to keep our distance for now.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Mew stink! Stay away from meow!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Further!
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan
Noir Corne
attributes.content: You guys—

attributes.name: Noir Corne
attributes.content: —Ah!
I'm feeling pretty dizzy, is it from all the headpecking earlier?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: I feel like... the earth is shaking... Did I pass out? Is this a dream?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: No, that's not it...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Get up! Now!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: There's so meowny of them...
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: Lots of meownsters are rushing down the mountain!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar
